casebody.data:
Norris DILLAHUNT and William Dove
v.
Johnnie CLARK, City of New Bern. No. 447P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Mark V.L. Gray, Greensboro, for Dillahunt & Dove. Scott C. Hart, New Bern, for Clark & City of New Bern.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of August 2006 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of May 2007."
